name: UsePhpVersion
description: Retrieve the specified version of PHP from the tool cache and add it to PATH.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: versionSpec
inputs.label: Version spec
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version range or exact version of a PHP version to use, using semver's version range syntax. [More information](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=2006180)

inputs.name: architecture
inputs.label: Architecture
inputs.helpMarkDown: The target architecture (x86, x64) of the PHP interpreter.

messages.VersionNotFound: Version spec %s for architecture %s did not match any version in the tool cache.
